name: timeout(_:scheduler:options:customError:)
desc: Terminates publishing if the upstream publisher exceeds the specified time interval without producing an element.
declaration: func timeout<S>(_ interval: S.SchedulerTimeType.Stride, scheduler: S, options: S.SchedulerOptions? = nil, customError: (() -> Self.Failure)? = nil) -> Publishers.Timeout<Self, S> where S : Scheduler
